content: Permanent Aluminum Awnings over deck and slideout
Professionally power-washed trailer and deck at the end of August
Big, open kitchen and living room area (misc. items inside won't stay)
Patio table with four chairs (Glider swing will not stay)
Private Master with King Bed and big screen TV
Washer / Dryer hookup in closet in bathroom
Pullout queen bed in sofa with extra pillow top for added comfort
Corelle dishes, some pans, silverware, toaster, and coffee maker included
